title: Can't Open up Store

embed.description: Gyazo te permite hacer una captura de pantalla y subir la imagen/GIF a internet. Puedes compartir el contenido fácilmente vía Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Disponible para Windows, Mac y Linux.

body: Just got enough IP to buy Kindred and was really excited to player her. After my game that gave me enough IP I went to the store to buy her, which was working before I joined a game. I click on store, yet it doesn't pop up. I've looked at other complaints about store, yet none look like they've experienced mine. There is a gray tint to it though, so I'm not sure what it is. Any help would be nice.

replies.body:
Same thing happened to me yesterday, and today it was working but now i have the "Not enough IP" bug. Awesome.
http://i63.tinypic.com/2n0ubnp.png"

Ohai, friend! The store is down right now while Heimerdinger and his crew of techs are frantically running around trying to fix some reported issues. 

https://67.media.tumblr.com/03adb8386e209f2e65a63179eb9cee06/tumblr_n2o7ycrTsY1tsjw49o1_r3_400.gif

You can follow updates on this if you keep an eye on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/). Let me know if you have any questions.
